gradle/org.gradle.tooling.model.idea/IdeaSingleEntryLibraryDependency

IdeaSingleEntryLibraryDependency

interface IdeaSingleEntryLibraryDependency : IdeaDependency, ExternalDependency(source)

"Single-Entry Module Library" as IDEA calls it. For example a single Jar file with sources Jar.

1.0-milestone-5
